column8:
Maybe it’s because he never crossed over to the pop audience as heavily as Motown stars, it maybe that his contributions and talent has yet to be recognized?
But judged on his records alone, Curtis Mayfield’s legacy is enormous.
Singer, songwriter, producer, he had it all.
This design is influenced by his early 70’s hit “If there’s hell below”, he was always surrounded by temptation but stayed clean and righteous and kept creating genuine soul and funk masterpieces.
column21: Curtis Mayfield, the legend, the genius, the soulful artist. Celebrated here on this t-shirt from weadmire.net
